entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
